title: Pipeline
description: This schema defines the Pipeline entity. A pipeline enables the flow of data from source to destination through a series of processing steps. ETL is a type of pipeline where the series of steps Extract, Transform and Load the data.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies a pipeline instance.

name.description: Name that identifies this pipeline instance uniquely.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this Pipeline. It could be title or label from the source services.

fullyQualifiedName.description: A unique name that identifies a pipeline in the format 'ServiceName.PipelineName'.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity.

pipelineUrl.description: Pipeline  URL to visit/manage. This URL points to respective pipeline service UI.

tasks.description: All the tasks that are part of pipeline.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

service.description: Link to service where this pipeline is hosted in.
